InitialFeedbackHistory: 05/06/2023 [REDACTED] PRET approvals noted in your DMP, G-2022-4768-R2 and G-2022-6123-R4, only concern the surveys you will carry out, not the fact that you will link the survey data with YouTube videos of the same participants. [REDACTED] is essential to include in your ethical approval. [REDACTED] YouTube videos also contain personal information that you need to handle in line with GDPR legislation. [REDACTED] is important to declare in your ethical approval that you will link survey data with public content. [REDACTED] either indicate where your existing PRET approvals cover the linking of survey data with YouTube content, or submit an additional PRET application for the linking of survey data to YT content, or amend the existing PRET files with this extra activity. [REDACTED] can consult the PRET team to discuss what is best: pret@kuleuven.be.
